name: Apocalypse, Wow!
description:
Travel through a surreal dreamscape in order to find your sister.

Apocalypse, Wow! combines top down map exploration with 2.5D action game play.

Engage in spear and shield combat against a variety of colorful enemies.

Explore Cities, small towns, and various dungeons filled with unique challenges.

Note: Apocalypse, Wow! is intended to act as a teaser for a larger project.
